TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationCredentials Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为使用基于表单的身份验证的 ASP.NET 应用程序配置用户凭据。

span.span: Configures user credentials for ASP.NET applications that use form-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种方法以编程方式访问和修改`credentials`的元素`forms`主题中`authentication`配置文件的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `credentials` element of a `forms` section in the `authentication` section of the configuration file. 此类型是包含的组的一部分，则，和类型。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 集合类型，但所有其他直接影响基础配置标记。With the exception of the collection type, all the others directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可将信息写入到根据定义的限制配置文件的相关部分。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by . 任何尝试在不允许在层次结构中级别的配置文件中写入将导致由分析器生成的错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类来读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 有关安全性和可伸缩性，建议使用外部存储库，例如数据库、 保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的多个属性指定值`credentials`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `credentials` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`credentials`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `credentials` section. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用`credentials`部分中，一定要遵循的指导原则，详见[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (http://msdn.microsoft.com)为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信."For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (http://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#1)]
